# Task

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.



# Data

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"])

```julia
using Base: @spawn

function pig_latinify(words::Vector{String})
    n = length(words)
    results = Vector{String}(undef, n)

    function to_pig_latin(word)
        first_letter = word[1]
        return "$(word[2:end])$(lowercase(first_letter))ay"
    end

    threads = []
    for i in 1:n
        @spawn results[i] = to_pig_latin(words[i])
    end

    foreach(wait, threads)

    return results
end

# Test the function with provided data
words = ["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"]
pig_latin_words = pig_latinify(words)
println(pig_latin_words)  # Output: ["ellohay", "appleyay", "trongsay", "orldway"]
```
